movie.title: A Man Escaped
movie.description_intro: Captured French Resistance fighter Lieutenant Fontaine awaits a certain death sentence for espionage in a stark Nazi prison in Lyon, France. Facing malnourishment and paralyzing fear, he must plot an extraordinary escape, complicated by the questions of whom to trust, and what lies beyond the small portion of the prison they are housed in.
movie.description_full: Captured French Resistance fighter Lieutenant Fontaine awaits a certain death sentence for espionage in a stark Nazi prison in Lyon, France. movies.title: Ten Years Japan
movies.summary: Five short 'film' stories of how 5 different directors imagine Japan to be in 10 years from now.
movies.description_full: Five short 'film' stories of how 5 different directors imagine Japan to be in 10 years from now.
movies.synopsis: Five short 'film' stories of how 5 different directors imagine Japan to be in 10 years from now.

movies.title: Desert Cathedral
movies.summary: A broken real estate developer mysteriously disappears into the Southwest in 1992, leaving behind a series of VHS tapes to his employer and family.
movies.description_full: A broken real estate developer mysteriously disappears into the Southwest in 1992, leaving behind a series of VHS tapes to his employer and family.

movies.title: Casa Vita
movies.summary: A baseball player finds unexpected happiness with a woman who works in his favorite restaurant.
movies.description_full: A baseball player finds unexpected happiness with a woman who works in his favorite restaurant.
movies.synopsis: A baseball player finds unexpected happiness with a woman who works in his favorite restaurant.

movies.title: Life Itself
movies.summary: As a young New York couple goes from college romance to marriage and the birth of their first child, the unexpected twists of their journey create reverberations that echo over continents and through lifetimes in Life Itself. Director and writer Dan Fogelman ("This Is Us") examines the perils and rewards of everyday life in a multi-generational saga featuring an international ensemble including Oscar Isaac, Olivia Wilde, Antonio Banderas, Annette Bening, Olivia Cooke, Sergio Peris- Mencheta, Laia Costa, Alex Monner and Mandy Patinkin. Set in New York City and Carmona, Spain, Life Itself celebrates the human condition and all of its complications with humor, poignancy and love.
